EntryName	CXL13_HUMAN
ProteinName	C-X-C motif chemokine 13 (Angie) (B cell-attracting chemokine 1) (BCA-1) (B lymphocyte chemoattractant) (CXC chemokine BLC) (Small-inducible cytokine B13)
GeneName	CXCL13 BCA1 BLC SCYB13
Length	109
Function	Chemotactic for B-lymphocytes but not for T-lymphocytes, monocytes and neutrophils. Does not induce calcium release in B-lymphocytes. Binds to BLR1/CXCR5.
Subcellular Location	Secreted
